tool.help:
Interactively explore Metadata in an HTML table ------------------------------------------------
Generate a tabular view of Metadata. The output visualization supports interactive filtering, sorting, and exporting to common file formats.
Parameters ---------- input : Metadata The metadata to tabulate. page_size : Int, optional The maximum number of Metadata records to display per page
Returns ------- visualization : Visualization \
